long_description: The Leki Corklite Trekking Poles help reduce stress on your knees by supporting and stabilizing your steps on and off the trail. Lightweight Aergon grips feature an edgeless shape and a cork/rubber composite that reduces sweat for a superior grip. Simple and fast, Speed Lock external locking system requires little effort to securely adjust and lock pole sections into position. Aluminum alloy allows thin shaft walls, providing a 20% reduction in swing weight without loss of strength; 3-section telescoping poles extend from 26.4 - 53.2 in. Durable carbide tip ends optimize grip on ice and rocks; baskets provide extra support on soft terrain. Scratch-resistant surfaces and high-polish lacquer help protect the Leki Corklite Trekking Poles from abrasion.
short_description: The Leki Corklite Trekking Poles help reduce stress on your knees by supporting and stabilizing your steps on and off the trail.
